title: Northern Expressway Project - Contract Package 07 - Construction of Sections from Pothuhera to Rambukkana (14.0 km) on the link Expressway and 3.5 km on Package 04 including Interchanges at Pothuhera and Rambukkana
decision_details: - the Government has given high priority for the construction of the portion of the Northern Expressway from Enderamulla to Galewela and the portion of the Link Expressway from Pothuhera to Galagedara. The proposal made by H.E. the President, in his capacity as the Minister of Highways, Ports and Shipping, to award the Contract Package 07 referred to above as recommended by the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee (SCAPC), was approved by the Cabinet.
